entry.title: U.S. Wants to See Russia Weakened, Says Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin After Ukraine Visit
entry.content: Mr. Austin’s comments came after he and Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with Ukraine’s president and announced more U.S. military aid to the country, while Moscow attacked Ukrainian railway hubs.

entry.title: Even in Defeat, Marine Le Pen Leads France's Far Right Closer to Power
entry.content: The candidate won 41.5% of the vote, showing that her once-fringe party is a political contender.

entry.title: Scale of Refugees From Ukraine War on Display in Poland's Public Schools
entry.content: Around 200,000 children have enrolled in schools since Russia invaded Ukraine. An estimated half-million are living in Poland and not yet enrolled.
